Control Weather (Seasons7 Tran): Modifies seasonal weather in 2 mile radius for 4d12 hr
Control Winds (Seasons6 Tran): R800' Changes wind direction and speed 6 levels in 800'x40' cylinder for 200 min

Fire Seeds (Smoke6 Conj): Touched 4 acorn grenades inflict 20d4 total or 8 berry bombs detonate on command to inflict 1d8+20 in 5' radius (DC 18 Ref half) for 200 min
Fire Shield (Smoke5 Evoc): Cold or hot flames enveloping self inflict 1d6+15 HP upon foe hit, reduce heat or cold damage by half (DC 17 Ref no HP) for 20 rd
Fog Cloud (Seasons2 Conj): R300' Fog in 20' radius obscures vision for 200 min
Goodberry (Seasons1 Tran): 2d4 berries provide a full meal and heal 1 HP for 20 dy
Ice Storm (Seasons5 Evoc): R1200' Hail in 20' radius inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning, 2d6 HP cold, -4 Perception for 20 rd
Incendiary Cloud (Smoke8 Conj): R300' Fire in 20' radius inflicts 6d6 HP (DC 20 Ref half) while moving away 10'/rd for 20 rd
Pyrotechnics (Smoke2 Tran): R1200' Target fire becomes fireworks (R120' blinded for 1d4+1 rd (DC 14 Will neg)) or choking smoke in 20' radius (suffer -4 Strength and Dexterity for d4+1 rd (DC 14 Fort neg)) for 20 rd
Stinking Cloud (Smoke3 Conj): R300' Fog in 20' radius obscures vision and causes nausea for 1d4+1 rd (no attacks or spells) (DC 15 Fort neg) for 20 rd
Storm Of Vengeance (Seasons9 Conj): R1200' 360' radius storm deafens for 1d4x10 min (DC 21 Fort neg), then rains acid inflicting 1d6 HP, then generates 6 bolts lightning that inflict 10d6 HP each (DC 21 Ref half), then hail that inflicts 5d6 HP, then obscures vision for 6 rd
Sunburst (Seasons8 Evoc): R1200' 80' radius blinds and inflicts 6d6 HP (undead and oozes 20d6 HP) (DC 20 Ref half, not blind)
Wall Of Fire (Smoke4 Evoc): R300' 400' wall inflicts 2d4 HP to creatures w/in 10', 1d4 HP to creatures w/in 20', 2d6+20 HP when passing through (undead dbl) for conc + 20 rd
